example.text: I remain committed to securing our southern border and ensuring rule of law is being upheld. In the 118th Congress, we will hold this Administration accountable for enabling an invasion of our southern border and ignoring the crisis their policies have caused.

Congress passed a Republican-led, bipartisan resolution to protect American workers by overturning a rule that allowed Chinese solar panels to be dumped on the US market, stifling competition, and making us more dependent on China in the process. This resolution passed the… [[url]] [[url]]

I've worked on this issue for the entirety of my time in Congress, and I'm excited to see the port expand! South Carolina is now able to accommodate the world's largest cargo ships, and we're ready for business!

This week, we saw where American Girl, a popular doll company, is telling young girls they could have been born in the wrong body and to ask their doctors for puberty-blocking medications or seek out support groups without parental consent. And recently, Balenciaga came under fire for its disgusting, grossly inappropriate ad campaign that included children and should be considered child abuse.

Fentanyl is an extremely deadly drug that cost the lives of nearly 70,000 Americans in 2021. Enough fentanyl to kill over 3.1 billion people (14,000 lbs.) has been seized at our southern border in FY2023 alone. It's past time to secure the border to save lives.… [[url]]

From the botched Afghanistan withdrawal, pushing reckless, inflationary spending, and refusing to secure the border, to now cutting terrible deals with Putin, we see a consistent pattern of bad judgment from the Biden Administration. There's no possible way to spin trading an arms dealer for a woke professional athlete, and leaving the Marine behind.

I urge the passage of the Protect Children's Innocence Act to protect kids from this abuse by prohibiting "doctors" from performing body-mutilating procedures or prescribing irreversible, deeply damaging drugs to gender-confused minors. I have also introduced the JUSTICE Act that will help combat the sexualization of children by making the import and transportation of child sex abuse dolls illegal.
